Class Applicant

java.lang.Object
User
Applicant
Direct Known Subclasses:
HDBOfficer
public class Applicant extends User
Represents an applicant user in the system. Extends the base User class and manages housing applications, projects, and enquiries.
See Also:

    • Applicant

      public Applicant(String name, String NRIC, int userID, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, Application currentApplication, ArrayList<Application> pastApplications)
      Constructs an Applicant with complete details.
      Parameters:
      name - the applicant's name
      NRIC - the applicant's national identification number
      userID - the applicant's user ID
      password - the applicant's password
      age - the applicant's age
      maritalStatus - the applicant's marital status
      currentApplication - the application the applicant is applying to
      pastApplications - list of previous applications

    • Applicant

      Parameters:

      flatType - the preferred flat type

    • viewApplicationStatus

      public ApplicationStatus viewApplicationStatus()
      Retrieves the status of the current application.
      Returns:
      the current application status

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal()
      Requests withdrawal of the current application. Changes application status to PENDINGWITHDRAWAL.

    • bookFlat

      public void bookFlat(HDBOfficer officer)
      Books a flat for the applicant.

      This method sets the booking status of the application to true and notifies the HDB officer.

      Parameters:
      officer - the HDBOfficer object responsible for processing the booking

    • getCurrentApplication
